Package com.sun.tools.visualvm.application.jvm

This package uses Jvmstat, JMX, SA and Attach API to present unifiled view for JVM.

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
MonitoredDataListener "monitoredDataEvent" event is periodically fired by Jvm.
 

Class Summary
HeapHistogram  
HeapHistogram.ClassInfo  
Jvm This class encapsulates functionality of the target Java application.
JvmFactory The JVMFactory class is a factory class for getting the Jvm representation for the Application.
MonitoredData This class encapsulates non-static information from JVM.
 

Package com.sun.tools.visualvm.application.jvm Description

This package uses Jvmstat, JMX, SA and Attach API to present unifiled view for JVM. The implemnetation uses the fastest method to get the requested infomation or operation.
